title: South Korea : e-commerce sales volume 2009 to 2018
yAxis: E-commerce sales volume in trillion Korean won
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing E-commerce sales volume in trillion Korean won, containing a total of 10 data points.
Overall E-commerce sales volume in trillion Korean won has increased over the Year.
E-commerce sales volume in trillion Korean won is slightly increasing from 2009 to 2018.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2016 and 2017.
Maximum E-commerce sales volume in trillion Korean won, about 113.73 was reported at Year 2018
Minimum E-commerce sales volume in trillion Korean won about 20.64 was reached at Year 2009
